title: Save the Date
overview: When successful wedding planner Dassy suddenly finds herself single again, her grandmother casts an ancient love potion to summon up Dassy's one true love. But something goes wrong with Grandma's spell, and suddenly Dassy is spoiled for choice! Instead of just "The One", Dassy now has four suitors from her past and present vying for her heart. With just two weeks to organize a high-stakes wedding for her high school mean girl, Dassy must navigate this romantic chaos and decide which man – if any – leads to her own "happily ever after".
